name: Star Farmer Simulator
description: Hello. This is my first ever game! Yippee... I have no experience whatsoever (no game design background, coding, blah). So please be kind and enjoy. This project was actually for a textile class I was taking in 2022, and it is based off of a video I made with puppets! If you have any critics or comments or bad or nice or happy or sad or whatever feelings you are feeling you can message me on instagram @cloverphobic !!!!!!!! ENJOY!
